lead_paragraph: Federal officials announced an indictment in Manhattan and the arrests of six of the defendants, who they said forced women and girls into prostitution.

headline.print_headline: 7 Accused of Smuggling Mexican Women for Sex
headline.main: 7 Men Accused in Sex-Trafficking Ring in U.S. and Mexico

snippet: Federal officials announced an indictment in Manhattan and the arrests of six of the defendants, who they said forced women and girls into prostitution....
abstract: Federal officials indict seven men in Manhattan on sex trafficking charges in what officials say was international organization forcing women and girls intro prostitution for more than decade in Mexico and United States; arrests were possible through collaboration with Mexican law enforcement agencies.
